description.en: Shindou just became a new investigator for Tokki: The Special Mobile Investigation Force. On the day of his graduation, he finally saw the half-naked girl that he had always saw in his dream in real life and finds out that she's part of Tokko: The Special Public Safety Task Force. Shindou ends up joining Tokko to avenge his parents' deaths, whose bodies were ripped into pieces…

The Earth's existence is under threat once more as Itarim, the gods of other universes, seek to fill the void left by the Absolute Being. 

Sung Jinwoo has no choice but to send Beru, the shadow ant king, to awaken his son's powers and start him on the journey he once took. 

Suho must conquer the shadow dungeon and earn his place in the world of hunters as he navigates through a new world against a new evil looking to swallow the world whole.
description.ko:
줄거리

평범한 대학생으로 살아가던 성수호 죽음을 앞둔 순간, 잠들어 있던 그의 특별한 혈통이 깨어난다!

“일어나라.”

죽음을 거스르고 지배하는 헌터, 그가 선보이는 새로운 레벨업을 주목하라!

* 이 작품은 웹툰 <나 혼자만 레벨업>의 세계관을 이어받은 작품입니다.
description.pt-br:
A existência da Terra está ameaçada novamente, por Itarim, os deuses de outros universos, buscam preencher o vazio deixado pelo Ser Absoluto.

Sung Jinwoo não tem outra opção senão enviar Beru, o rei das formigas das sombras, para despertar os poderes de seu filho e iniciar sua jornada, como ele fez antes.

Suho precisa conquistar a masmorra das sombras e ganhar seu lugar no mundo dos caçadores, enquanto enfrenta um novo mal que ameaça engolir o mundo inteiro.

title.en: Kono Ai wo Owarasete kurenai ka

altTitles.ja: この愛を終わらせてくれないか
Kono Ai o Owarasete kurenai ka

altTitles.zh: 能让这份爱画上休止符吗

altTitles.vi: Chấm dứt tình yêu này đi được không?

description.en: Yuzu is Hayami Madoka's ardent fan. Having no friends or family that care for her, Madoka is her only solace. Being that Sachiko is Madoka's best friend, she is Yuzu's most hated existence. To vent, she opens a secret account where she posts malicious comments about Sachiko. When she discovers this, she instead attempts to befriend Yuzu and offers her a chance to talk to Madoka. However, an accident occurs and they end up switching bodies with Sachiko being left in coma.
description.vi:
Hachikawa Yuzu, một nữ sinh cấp 3 với cuộc đời học đường ảm đạm có một bí mật. Rằng thực chất cô ấy là một người hâm mộ cuồng nhiệt của Hayami Madoka, bạn cùng lớp và cũng là một nữ diễn viên nổi tiếng.
Yuzu, ngưỡng mộ và tôn sùng Madoka như một nữ thần, cảm thấy hạnh phúc khi chỉ đơn giản được học cùng lớp và nhìn ngắm Madoka mỗi ngày.
Lẽ ra chỉ như thế đã đủ, nhưng cho tới một ngày...
Một câu chuyện tình yêu méo mó nhưng đồng thời cũng vô cùng thuần khiết.

description.en:
Have you ever skipped studying to play video games? Unfortunately for high school senior Yushin Lee, the stakes are a little higher than flunking, as he finds himself trapped in a VR-based MMORPG. 

Yushin was selected to beta test the game, only to be forced to fight for his life in a seemingly endless loop. What was supposed to be a light distraction from the stress of high-school life becomes a desperate struggle for survival as Yushin battles his way through REAL Online, a dark fantasy world created by a mysterious tech company with uncertain motives.

---

- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hgICDv_sf9k)
- [Alternate Official English (Tappytoon)](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/book/knight-under-my-heart)
description.ko:
신작 가상현실 게임을 즐기러 간 이유신.
그러나 그것은 단순한 게임이 아니었다.
동화율 100%!
모든 감각이 현실처럼 느껴지는 게임 속 세상-
로그아웃이 허락되지 않는
끊임없이 이어지는 죽음과 부활 속에서 유신은 싸움을 각오한다.
탈출할 수 없는 지옥같은 전장을 빠져나오기 위해서…

---

- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hgICDv_sf9k)
description.ru:
Ли Ю Шин отправился насладиться новой игрой в VR.
Но это была не просто игра... 
Это был игровой мир, где передача ощущений из реальности переваливала за 100%! 
В бесконечной череде смертей и воскрешений, где выход из системы невозможен, Ю Шин готовится к бою, чтобы сбежать с адского поля битвы, от которого нет спасения...

---

- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hgICDv_sf9k)
description.pt-br: Lee Yooshin foi experimentar um novo jogo de realidade virtual. No entanto, não foi apenas um jogo. Tem uma taxa de assimilação de 100%! Um mundo de jogo onde tudo parece assustadoramente real -No ciclo interminável de morte e ressurreição, onde o logout não é permitido, Yooshin se prepara para lutar. Para escapar do campo de batalha infernal do qual não há escapatória…

altTitles.ja: 無邪気の楽園 パラレル

description.en: As a direct continuation of Mujaki no Rakuen, we see Shouta in even more troublesome and various situations.

Suzuki Aoba, a gloomy, social outcast, is satisfied with his Highschool life though he occasionally gets beaten up by his classmate Iwase Sannosuke in "play-fights". One day, Aoba is saved from a "play-fight" by none other than Akasawa Kenshin, a boy from the class next door and the rising rookie superstar sensation of the MMA world. However, Kenshin wonders aloud if Aoba feels empty when Aoba states that he doesn't have a dream, which Aoba doesn't react to kindly. He vows to land one punch on Kenshin in the future. Aobas joins the Shark Gym lead by the sloppy Kanenari Tokiwa to achieve his dream of besting Kenshin.
description.ja: 日陰者の道を歩んできた主人公・青葉。 譲れぬ“想い”を押し通すため、 総合格闘技“MMA”の世界へ飛び込んでゆく――!!
description.pt-br: Uma história sobre o mal humorado Aoba Suzuki e a estrela em ascensão Kenshin Akasawa moldando seus caminhos para o mundo das lutas de MMA.

Damals hatte Dokja noch überhaupt keine Ahnung. Er hatte keine Ahnung, dass sein Lieblings-Web-Roman ‘Drei Wege um die Apokalypse zu überleben’ Realität wird und dass er der einzige ist, der weiß wie der Weltuntergang aussehen wird. Er hatte auch keine Ahnung, dass er letztendlich der Protagonist von diesem Roman werden würde. Jetzt begibt sich Dokja auf eine Reise, um den Lauf der Geschichte zu ändern und die Menschheit zu retten!

description.en: Dokja was an average office worker whose sole interest was reading his favorite web novel 'Three Ways to Survive the Apocalypse.' But when the novel suddenly becomes reality, he is the only person who knows how the world will end. Armed with this realization, Dokja uses his understanding to change the course of the story, and the world, as he knows it.
description.es:
En ese entonces, Dokja no tenía idea de que su novela web favorita, Tres maneras de sobrevivir al apocalipsis, cobraría vida y que solo él sabría cómo iba a terminar el mundo. Tampoco tenía idea de que se convertiría en el protagonista de esta novela transformada en realidad. Ahora Dokja debe embarcarse en un viaje para alterar el curso de la historia y salvar a la humanidad de una vez por todas.

「ありえない...これは俺が知っている展開だ。」 10年以上読み続けた小説の最終話を読んだ日、世界は滅亡し小説の世界が現実となった。 平凡で冴えないサラリーマンの主人公・ドクシャ。 そんな彼の趣味はWEB小説『滅亡した世界で生き残る３つの方法』を読むこと。 ついに最終話を読み終えたかと思いきや、作者からのメッセージが届き小説のモンスターと登場人物が突如現れ、新たな世界が幕を開けた！ 「俺は、この世界の結末を知る唯一の読者となった。」 たった一人だけが読み終えたファンタジー小説が現実に。 果たしてドクシャは滅亡した世界を救うことができるのか？

description.en: A high school boy who sees things that shouldn't be there encounters an enthusiastic girl from the occult research club. (Manga Mogura)

”Is it okay to kill people?"  
A treacherous revenge suspense by Shiryu Nakatake, a newcomer to Bessatsu Shonen Magazine.  

"Shun, if someone is converted, let him go and do nothing. He should be given a chance to be reborn."  

"Grandpa, I hope he doesn't reincarnate himself."  
In order to defeat several non-human monsters, the boy also became something non-human.  

Shun Uruma, a sixth-grade student, was named "Experimental body: A" by five of his classmates and was severely bullied and lived in hell. His only peace was with his brother, who loved him, and his parents, who protected him…. . until the five monsters killed his family.  

When he finally loses everything and faces true hell, a dark "wish" is born inside Shun. He was reborn under the training of his grandfather, who served in a secret unit during WWII. Now, four years later, he appears in front of his fated enemy.  

"I won't let ANYONE get in the way of my revenge."
description.fr:
"Est-ce que c'est bien de tuer des gens ?"  

Un thriller de vengeance par Shiryu Nakatake, un nouveau venu dans le magazine Bessatsu Shōnen.  

Shun Uruma, un élève de 6ème, a été nommé "Sujet de test A" par cinq de ses camarades de classe. Il a été sévèrement malmené et a vécu un enfer. Sa seule joie était son frère, qui l'aimait, et ses parents, qui le protégeaient… jusqu'à ce que ces cinq monstres tuent sa famille.  
Lorsqu'il perd finalement tout et qu'il affronte le véritable enfer, un sombre "souhait" naît en lui. Il renaît sous l'entraînement de son grand-père, qui a servi dans une unité secrète pendant la Seconde Guerre mondiale. Aujourd'hui, quatre ans plus tard, il apparaît devant son ennemi juré.  

"Je ne laisserai personne m'enlever cette vengeance."
description.ja:
人は、殺してもいい？　 　
「別マガ」沸騰の新星・中武士竜が描く、背徳の復讐サスペンス！
「俊、改心した者は見逃せ。人には生まれ変わるチャンスが必要や。」
「じいちゃん、僕は奴らが変わってないことを祈るよ。」
──人ならざる化け物たちを斃すため、少年もまた、人ならざる何かに成った。


“実験体Ａ”と名付けられ、同級生5人から嬲られる日々。小学6年生の漆間俊は、壮絶ないじめに苦しむ「地獄」の中にいた。だが、そこには兄想いの弟と、子を守る父母という「救い」があった。あの日、5人の化け物たちが、鬼畜の所業で家族を奪い去るまでは……。やがて、全てを失い、真の地獄を見た俊の中に暗い「願い」が宿った。戦時中、秘密部隊に所属した祖父の指導の下、生まれ変わる少年。そして4年が経った時、彼は因縁の敵の前に姿を現す……。この復讐は誰にも渡さない。
description.es-la:
**"¿Está bien matar a la gente?"** 
Un traicionero suspenso de venganza de Shiryu Nakatake, un recién llegado a Bessatsu Shonen Magazine.  

**"Shun, si alguien ha cambiado, déjalo ir y no hagas nada. Hay que darle la oportunidad de renacer".**

**"Abuelo, espero que no se reencarne".** 
Para derrotar a varios monstruos no humanos, el chico también se convirtió en algo no humano.  

Shun Uruma, un estudiante de sexto grado, fue nombrado "Cuerpo experimental: A" por cinco de sus compañeros de clase y sufrió un severo acoso escolar y vivió un infierno. Su única paz era con su hermano, que le quería, y sus padres, que le protegían... . hasta que los cinco monstruos mataron a su familia.  

Cuando finalmente lo pierde todo y se enfrenta al verdadero infierno, un oscuro "deseo" nace dentro de Shun. Renace bajo el entrenamiento de su abuelo, que sirvió en una unidad secreta durante la Segunda Guerra Mundial. Ahora, cuatro años después, se presenta frente a su predestinado enemigo.  

**"No dejaré que NADIE se interponga en mi venganza".**
description.pt-br: "É certo matar pessoas?" - Um suspense de vingança traiçoeira e vil de Shiryu Nakatake, mangaka recém-chegado à revista Bessatsu Shonen. - "Shun, deixe aqueles que mudarem viver. Pessoas precisam de oportunidades pra renascer." "Vovô, eu espero que eles não hajam mudado em nada." Para aniquilar vários monstros desumanos, um garoto também se tornou algo desumano. Shun Uruma, então colegial do sexto ano, foi nomeado de "Cobaia A" por cinco de seus colegas de classe. Severamente intimidado, viveu sob terror. Seu único consolo era seu irmão, que o amava, e seus pais, que o protegiam ... Porém, aqueles cinco monstros mataram até mesmo sua família. Ao perder tudo, ele se vê em um verdadeiro inferno; mas um "desejo" sombrio desperta em Shun. Renascido sob o treinamento de seu avô – que serviu em uma unidade militar secreta durante a II Guerra Mundial – após quatro anos, ele reaparece diante de seus inimigos predestinados. "Eu não vou deixar NINGUÉM tirar essa vingança de mim."

altTitles.th: บุปผาราชินี

description.en:
Long ago, there existed a land divided into four countries: Sou, Kou, Do, and Ah. The King of Ah took on a wife from Kou and soon thereafter one from Do, creating a shaky alliance between the three nations. When the Second Queen gave birth to a son, the King cast aside the sickly First Queen and her daughter Aki into the depths of the Palace. But as Fate would have it, Princess Aki encounters a slave named Hakusei, who has peculiar golden hair and sky blue eyes. He promises his life to her and helps her train in the Six Arts under the guidance of the enigmatic merchant Seitetsu. However, when Aki outshines the Prince during a hunt in an attempt to gain her father's acknowledgement, she inadvertently sparks a war by besmirching Do's honor and drives the Second Queen to poison her mother. With nothing left but her faithful Hakusei, Aki is banished to the small country of Kou with a vow to return to Ah one day for revenge. But in the face of the mighty allied nations of Do and Ah, will the two survive long enough to carry out Aki’s vow?  
  
*Winner of the 60th Shogakukan Manga Awards for Best Shoujo.*

altTitles.ja: デビィ・ザ・コルシファは負けず嫌い

description.en:
*"I know! I'll destroy some humans to kill time!"*   
  
The strongest demon ever makes an unexpected appearance! But she's… a total airhead?! A comedy about a clumsy but emulous demon trying to kill time begins!
description.es:
"¡Lo sé! ¡Destruiré a algunos humanos para matar el tiempo!"

¡El demonio más fuerte de todos los tiempos hace una aparición inesperada! Pero es... ¡una cabeza hueca total! ¡Comienza una comedia sobre un demonio torpe pero émulo que intenta matar el tiempo!
description.ja: 「暇つぶしに人間でも滅ぼすかのう！」突如として現れた、史上最強の悪魔！でもコイツ...チョロすぎ!?ポンコツだけど負けず嫌いな悪魔と繰り広げる暇つぶしコメディー、開幕!!
description.ru: Однажды в комнату Рокуро неожиданно заявился сильнейший в мире демон! Но постойте, что же это... Неужто она настолько пустоголовая!? Встречайте великолепную комедийную историю о неуклюжем демоне, пытающимся скоротать время за людскими играми!

description.en: The tsuntsuntsuntsuntsuntsuntsuntsuntsuntsuntsundere girl getting less and less tsun day by day.

Haro Ogawa, a high school student, is also a self-taught oil painter who is trying to paint the ultimate nude. 
After an unexpected encounter with an elusive "witch", he sets his sights on applying to art school... 
The mystery that resides in the human body, the ultimate "beauty", will be painted on canvas! 
A skin-colored coming-of-age drama!
description.ja: 「俺もいつかこんなヌードを描きたい――」　幼少時に見た絵画、「魔女のヌード」に魅入られた高校生・小川波路（おがわはろ）。日々、独学でヌードを描く彼の前に現れたのは、「魔女のヌード」に描かれた女性に瓜二つの美女、神生伶だった。ハロは思わず、伶にヌードモデルになってほしいと頼みこむが…!?　目指すはヌードで藝大合格!!

description.en:
From the author of Gokusen and Koudaike no Hitobito comes the story of Yui Hayakawa:
an ordinary, uninspired high school girl who's only good at one thing - running! 
But because of her genius younger brother Takeru and his latest experiment, a time machine, 
she accidentally gets sent back to the Sengoku Era missing her beloved dinner steak! 
Will young Yui finally find that 'something' where her entire potential was hiding? 
And will she ever be able to eat that delicious steak her mother made for her?

Nagomu Irino returns to his Kyoto home for the first time in ten years when his father is hospitalized. Nagomu is eager to take over Ryokushou, the family's Japanese sweet shop, but he's instead asked to be a father figure to Itsuka Yukihira, the girl everyone calls the successor.

altTitles.es-la: El Hijo Menor del Renombrado Clan Mágico

altTitles.en: Youngest Son of the Renowned Magic Clan

description.en:
As the author of "Swordmaster Sade," Cha Sungmin had no idea how dangerous his plot-hole-riddled novel could be until he's reborn as Rasen Mayton, a spoiled side character destined to die at 17. As if being stuck in the body of a rude scumbag despised by everyone wasn't enough, Sungmin also discovers that he was reborn at a point before his story began. 

With almost no knowledge about the current timeline, will Sungmin be able to survive in this unwritten world as House Mayton's youngest?

altTitles.en: Don't Forget That I Like You

altTitles.ja: ルームメイトはイケメンに弱い

description.en: "Handsome people are the best!" Jiho caught Jungmin's eye- a returning student at the freshmen welcoming party… Be it for women or men, Jungmin is actually a major Ul-ppa* (*Korean slang for someone who is weak for beautiful and handsome people) and he finds Jiho extremely attractive. That was the extent of their first meeting, but for some reason, their strings of fate kept getting tangled with each other?!

description.en:
Lee Myung-jun, the Vice Chairman of Hyundo Group, lost his daughter to a group of bullies. Seeking revenge, he adopts Yoon Karma, a psychopathic defector girl.

Yoon Karma: A sadistic human weapon created through drug experiments in North Korea. After killing everyone in the research lab, she escaped to South Korea on her own.

Having just been released from a juvenile detention center in South Korea, Yoon Karma sets out to hunt down the bullies at school, driven by the desire to avenge her new father and satisfy her sadistic pleasures.
description.pt-br:
Lee Myung-jun, o vice-presidente do grupo Hyundo, perdeu sua filha para um grupo de pessoas que faziam bullying. Buscando vingança, ele adota Yoon Karma, uma garota desertora psicopata.
Yoon Karma: Uma arma humana sádica criada por meio de experimentos com drogas na Coreia do Norte. Depois de matar todos no laboratório de pesquisa, ela escapou para a Coreia do Sul sozinha.
Tendo acabado de ser libertada de um centro de detenção juvenil na Coreia do Sul, Yoon Karma sai para caçar os valentões na escola, movida pelo desejo de vingar seu novo pai e satisfazer seus prazeres sádicos.

altTitles.en: The Sleepless Night of the Maid

altTitles.es-la: La noche de insomnio de la doncella

description.en:
After the ruin of an aristocratic family in England, Eva Macy has been living a difficult life as a maid at an acquaintance’s house, where she happens to meet her ex-fiancé Prince Edward.

Despite being a strong and cold-hearted person, he is affectionate towards her. After he leaves, Eva realizes that he’s her first love. However, she decides to give up on her current feelings, believing it to be in her best interest to do so.

After overcoming such a difficult time, Eva's feelings for Edward calmed down, but one day, Edward suddenly appeared before her as if to stir up Eva’s heart again.

Eva becomes a chambermaid for her ex-fiancé Edward, where he constantly tries to seduce Eva.

The relationship she thought had ended a long time ago continues again in his chambers...

title.en: Wazawai no Avalon ~Game Saijaku no Akuyaku Debu ni Ten'i Shita kedo, Ore dake "Yasereba Tsuyokute New Game" na Sekai datta no de, Saisoku Level Up & Hametsu Flag Kaihi de Kage no Eiyuu o Mezashimasu~

altTitles.ja: 災悪のアヴァロン～ゲーム最弱の悪役デブに転移したけど、俺だけ“やせれば強くてニューゲーム”な世界だったので、最速レベルアップ＆破滅フラグ回避で影の英雄を目指します～

altTitles.en: Finding Avalon: The Quest of a Chaosbringer

description.en:
The main character loves the MMORPG game called Dungeon Explorer Chronicle (Dun-Ex). During one particular day, a beta test event was announced, and he managed to beat it.
In exchange for clearing the event, he was granted permission to try the beta test server. Forcing to choose different avatar and skill as the system doesn't allow his own, he eventually settled on random. However, he is transferred to a place where, as expected, he finds a fat, villainous mob character...!
description.ja: 廃人ゲーマーの会社員“俺”は、やり込んだVRMMO「ダンエク」の世界に転移した。しかし転移先は悪役のデブキャラで!?

altTitles.en: Reincarnated Savage: Karate Survivor in Another World

altTitles.ja: 野人転生: KARATE SURVIVOR IN ANOTHER WORLD

description.en:
When 34-year-old Nozaki Hitoshi is hit by a truck, he is sent to a fantasy world by a dismissive god and dropped into a harsh wilderness without even the clothes on his back. His only salvation is a newly granted karate skill and his general survival instincts. Luckily, Hitoshi is up for the challenge–he’ll weave clothes out of tree bark, test fruit for poison, and crawl through the mud to test his kicks and punches against goblins and other creatures. No matter how much he levels up in this world, he still longs to find other humans to share his solitude. An engrossing fantasy that pits karate technique against swords and sorcery in another world!

(Source: Seven Seas Entertainment)
- [Web Novel Raw](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n5771ei/)  
- [Alternate Raw: NicoNico](http://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/41841)
description.ja: 姓名と風貌から、「野人」と呼ばれている野崎人志は、ひょんなことから異世界に転生させられる。
description.es-la: Nozaki Hitoshi, conocido como el "Hombre Salvaje" por su apellido y apariencia, se reencarna accidentalmente en otro mundo.

description.en:
While going home from his part-time job, Zen, a normal guy, suddenly got transported in the middle of the street of an unknown world. He met a silver-haired man who hides his eyes and learned that he's now in a parallel universe. Zen is a simple man - he doesn't really get what's happening but there's something called 'Dom' and 'Sub' and he's entranced by the man's glare.
Now he can't get enough of his commands.

altTitles.ja: 真夜中ハートチューン

altTitles.en: Tune In to the Midnight Heart

altTitles.pt-br: Sintonizando com o Coração da Meia Noite
Em busca da garota por trás da voz

description.en:
"Late at night, alone on my bed, your voice was the only thing that saved me. I want to talk to you again. There's something I want to say."

Without knowing her real name or face, Yamabuki Arisu, a second-year high school student, was looking for a girl named "Apollo'' who was a livestreamer. However, one day, Arisu gets a clue about Apollo from the broadcast club of the high school where she is going. There were 4 beautiful girls who dreamed of "getting a job related to voice"!! Who is Apollo? What will happen to the dreams of the four people?
___
**Links:**
- Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10568/episode/347385) (U.S. Only)
description.ja:
「深夜ひとり、ベッドの上、キミの声だけが救いだった。もう一度キミと話したい。言いたいことがあるんだ」。

高校2年生の山吹有栖は、「アポロ」という名の、顔も本名も知らないラジオ配信者の少女を探していた。だがある日、有栖は進学先の高校の放送部にアポロの手がかりを得る。そこにいたのは「声に関わる仕事に就く」夢を描く美少女が…4人!! アポロは誰？4人の夢の行方は？かわいくも懸命なサクセスラブコメ、ここに開演!!
description.ru:
«Пока я лежал на кровати посреди ночи в полном одиночестве, твой голос был моим единственным утешением. Я хочу поговорить с тобой ещё раз. И должен кое-что тебе сказать».

Ямабуки Арису, ученик второго класса старшей школы, ищет бывшую ведущую радио-стримов «Аполло», не зная ни её лица, ни имени. Однако, однажды он понимает, что Аполло скрывается среди участниц клуба радиовещания в его школе. Четыре красавицы оттуда мечтают получить работу, связанную с голосом. Но которая из них — Аполло? И что станет с их мечтами? Милый ромком о тяжёлом труде и успехе начинается!
description.pt-br: Yamabuki Arisu, um estudante do segundo ano do ensino médio, estava procurando por uma garota chamada “Apollo”, que era locutora de rádio e ele não conhecia seu rosto ou seu nome verdadeiro. No entanto, um dia, Arisu recebe uma pista sobre Apollo do clube de transmissão da escola secundária para a qual ela estava indo. Havia quatro belas garotas que sonhavam em “conseguir um emprego relacionado à voz”!! Quem é Apollo? O que acontecerá com os sonhos dessas quatro pessoas? Uma comédia romântica fofa, mas trabalhadora e de sucesso, começa aqui!!

altTitles.ja: くらいあの子としたいこと

altTitles.ja-ro: Kurai Ano Ko to Shitai Koto

altTitles.en: What I’d Like to Do with That Gloomy Girl

altTitles.zh: 想与阴暗的她一起做的事

altTitles.zh-ro: Xiǎng yǔ yīn'àn de tā yīqǐ zuò de shì

altTitles.id: Apa yang inginku lakukan dengan gadis yang murung itu?

altTitles.vi: Cô nàng u ám cùng lớp của tôi

description.en: That gloomy girl is so beautiful! Let's aim for it!
description.ja: 新学期から脱ぼっちを目指す高校2年生・田端蓮。友達の為に最初に声をかけたのは、なんだか暗くてちょっぴり怖い。でも目が離せない女の子、佐々木透子で。。。。
description.pt-br: A garota sombria é linda!  Uma romcom escolar sobre uma garota fofa e tímida e um garoto que quer fazer amigos!

description.en:
Hong Il-tak, the only red spot at Daemun Namgo. Despite his name and nickname, he's a boy, and his dwarfism and peculiar appearance have led to him being looked down upon by everyone from the nerds to the elders, and he's at the bottom of the school hierarchy. 

In the past, until his sophomore year, Iltak had been a famous member of the Iljin, but a problem of his own brought him to the bottom of the food chain... 

"His secondary sexuality. If only he'd come to me...!" 

After enduring daily teasing and bullying because his body stopped growing like his peers, Hong Il-taek thought of a way to move up in the ranks... 

"If I can befriend this guy, who's in the second grade at Dae-moon Boys' High School, I'll be able to move up again!" 

But for some reason, Lee Hyun-woo tries to keep his distance from Hong Il-taek... Can Hong Il-taek find his former glory again?

altTitles.ja-ro: Otoko ni mo Onna ni mo Naru Chuugaku Kyoushi

altTitles.ja: その着せ替え人形は恋をする

altTitles.es-la: Esa muñeca de porcelana está enamorada

altTitles.th: หนุ่มเย็บผ้ากับสาวนักคอสเพลย์

Nàng Búp Bê Thử Đồ Của Tôi Biết Yêu

altTitles.en: The Bisque Doll Is Falling in Love
The Bisque Doll Falls in Love

description.en: Wakana Gojou is a fifteen year old high-school boy who was socially traumatized in the past due to his passions. That incident left a mark on him that made him into a social recluse. Until one day he had an encounter with Kitagawa who is a sociable gyaru, who is the complete opposite of him. They soon share their passions with one another which leads to their odd relationship.
description.fr:
Wakana Gojo est un lycéen solitaire. Son rêve est de devenir artisan et de fabriquer les poupées traditionnelles pour le Hina Matsuri. Mais comme cette passion n’est pas très virile, il la cache et ne se fait pas remarquer. Jusqu’au jour ou Marine Kitagawa, la fille la plus populaire du lycée, le voit se servir d’une machine à coudre ! Contre toute attente elle lui demande de devenir son couturier pour réaliser… des tenues de cosplay !

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kana**
description.tr: Wakana Gojou, vadesi geçmiş tutkuları nedeniyle toplumsal travmaları olan 15 yaşında bir liselidir. Bu olayın bıraktığı iz onu toplumdan uzak biri haline getirdi. Bir gün kendisinin tam zıttı, arkadaş canlısı bir gal olan Kitagawa ile karşılaşır. Kısa zamanda garip ilişkilerini yönlendiren tutkularını paylaşırlar.
description.uk:
Вакана Ґоджьо — п’ятнадцятилітній учень старшої школи, в минулому отримав серйозну психологічну травму на фоні свого захоплення. Внаслідок чого хлопець ізолював себе від соціуму і почав вести затворницький образ життя.
Так було би і на далі, але в життя Ґоджьо буквально увірвалась Кітаґава — дружелюбна і комунікабельна дівчина, повна його протилежність. Досить швидко вони розділили хоббі один одного, що і привело до їх досить дивних, але міцних відносин.
description.vi: Wakana Gojou 15 tuổi là 1 học sinh cao trung từng bị tổn thương tâm lý trong quá khứ do sở thích kỳ lạ của mình. Chuyện đó đã khiến cậu trở nên nhút nhát, rụt rè. Cho tới ngày nọ Gojou tình cờ gặp Kitagawa – một Gyaru – người có tính cách trái ngược hoàn toàn với cậu ấy. 2 người họ hóa ra đều có những điểm chung và đã tạo thành một mối quan hệ hài hước
description.es-la: Wakana Gojou es un joven de quince años de edad que se vio traumatizado socialmente en el pasado debido a sus pasiones. Ese incidente le dejó una marca que lo convirtió en un recluso social. Hasta que un día tuvo un encuentro con Kitagawa, una gyaru sociable, que es todo lo contrario a él. Pronto comparten sus pasiones entre sí, lo que da lugar a su extraña relación.
description.pt-br: Wakana Gojou é um garoto de quinze anos que foi socialmente traumatizado no passado devido a suas paixões. Aquele incidente deixou uma marca nele que o fez ser um recluso social. Até que um dia ele teve um encontro com Kitagawa, que é um gyaru sociável, que é o completo oposto dele. Eles logo compartilham suas paixões uns com os outros, o que leva a um relacionamento estranho.

description.en: An unofficial compilation of oneshots / 4-komas by Cacomistle (カコミスル) in their twitter profile.

[Winner of the 2024 Summer Afternoon Kishi Prize] The story of Jui, the son of a soldier, and Mayaa, a teenager from Painu Island. Different backgrounds have torn apart their friendship, but an attack by a demon named Moon that lurks on the island brings them together again!?
description.ja: 【アフタヌーン四季賞2024夏 準入選】軍人の息子・ジュイと、パイヌ島民の少年・マーヤ。立場の違いが二人の友情を引き裂くが、島に潜む魔物・ムンの襲撃が再会をもたらし!?
description.vi: [Tác phẩm đã đoạt giải trong cuộc thi Giải thưởng Afternoon Kishi mùa hè năm 2024] Câu chuyện về Jui, con trai một quân nhân, và Mayaa, cậu thiếu niên dân đảo Painu. Bối cảnh khác nhau đã chia rẽ tình bạn của họ, nhưng cuộc tấn công của loài ma quỷ tên Moon ẩn náu trên đảo đã một lần nữa đưa họ gần với nhau!?

description.en:
Mary-san who calls you on the phone, telling you she's nearby...nothing but a prank call, right? Witness the cute and charming life she lives!

This is based on the Japanese urban legend Mary-san.  If it makes no sense at all to you, see https://www.kowabana.net/2018/06/09/mary-san/ and it will be a lot more comprehensible, while still being cute.

title.en: Drawing: Saikyou Mangaka wa Oekaki Skill de Isekai Musou Suru!

altTitles.ja: ドローイング 最強漫画家はお絵かきスキルで異世界無双する！

altTitles.en: Drawing: The Greatest Mangaka Becomes a Skilled “Martial Artist” in Another World

altTitles.zh-hk: 作畫 最強漫畫家利用繪畫技能在異世界開無雙！

altTitles.vi: Drawing: Mangaka Mạnh Nhất Với Kỹ Năng Vẽ Tranh Vô Song Tại Dị Giới

description.en:
Akira Kamishiro was a very successful manga author, who was diagnosed with blood cancer one day. He regretted the way he lived, where he could only build up empty relationships. Angry at his mother for asking him to send her some money, he died in a car accident. He was given a chance to choose his new mother and reincarnate in another world.

Akira, not wanting to have a repeat of his past life, decided to choose an ordinary but safe life.. He was reincarnated as Akira, the only son of a magic store, with his previous life's memories. He had no talent for swordsmanship or magic, but he didn’t care as he was still loved by his family. At one point, he realized that he can embody various things by "drawing a picture". That's when he noticed his cheat ability...!?
description.ja: 漫画家として大成功を収めていた神代彰は、成功だけに囚われて人間関係を蔑ろにし続けた自分の人生を後悔しながら死んでしまう。そんな彰を待っていたのは、自分で母親を選んで異世界転生するチャンス！？転生した彰は剣術も魔法もダメダメだったが、家族に愛されながら平穏な生活を送っていた。しかしあるとき、「絵を描く」ことでいろいろなものを具現化できるチート能力に気がついてしまって……？
description.vi: Akira, một họa sĩ tài năng nhưng sau khi bị bệnh ung thư anh đã nhận ra xung quanh mình chẳng còn gì ngoại trừ cái danh hiệu "thành công" của mình. Không có người đi cùng mình đến bệnh viện, người mẹ, người thân duy nhất của anh cũng đòi anh đưa tiền mới chịu đi cùng anh. Trong cơn giận anh đã vô tình gây tai nạn và được chuyển sinh sang thế giới khác. Một thế giới mới với một cuộc sống mới anh quyết định sống một cách bình thường và giữ gìn hạnh phúc gia đình nhỏ nhoi của mình
description.pt-br: Akira Kamidai lamenta ter conseguido construir apenas uma relação vazia, embora tenha feito muito sucesso como cartunista. Uma vida em um lugar medíocre onde eu queria que Akira fosse uma pessoa com magia. Reencarnação em uma loja voltada para a esgrima. Esgrima! Esgrima! Esgrima! Esgrima! Esgrima! Eu estava vivendo uma vida ideal para uma família amada por espadachins. Descobri a habilidade de trapaça que encarnar várias coisas atravéz de um ”desenho”…? Uma aventura mundial diferente para proteger seu paradeiro, tecida por Akira que quer levar uma vida normal...!

description.en: "Botsu" as in "rejected/unused concept"

In the oppressive city of Detroit, Akio is sold by his dad and becomes an assassin known as Snake. Day after day, he simply follows orders. But suddenly, he meets a blind girl and finds new meaning in life…!
description.vi: Detroit là thành phố nơi người lớn thống trị mọi thứ. Akio bị bán, trở thành sát thủ với tên gọi là Rắn. Cuộc sống hàng ngày của cậu chỉ là tuân theo mệnh lệnh. Một ngày, cậu gặp một cô gái mù và dần dần tìm ra ý nghĩa mới của cuộc sống...

title.en: Kinsou no Vermeil ~Gakeppuchi Majutshi wa Saikyou no Yakusai to Mahou Sekai wo Tsukisusumu~

altTitles.ja: 金装のヴェルメイユ ～崖っぷち魔術師は最強の厄災と魔法世界を突き進む～

altTitles.en: Vermeil in Gold: The Failing Student and the Strongest Scourge Plunge Into the World of Magic

altTitles.ko: 금장의 벨메이유 ∼벼랑 끝 마술사는 최강의 재액과 마법세계를 헤쳐나간다

altTitles.zh: 金装的维尔梅～濒临堕落的魔法师和最强的灾厄一起冲入魔法世界～

altTitles.ru: Вермейл в золотом: Сильнейший маг проходит через магический мир с сильнейшей катастрофой

description.en:
A student at the magic school, Alto, who was on the verge of repeating the school year, accidentally found a book that activated a magic circle, and as a result, summoned the sealed devil Vermeil! Vermeil is a very unhealthy older sister with a power devastating enough to be called a disaster!
___
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [Manga UP!](https://global.manga-up.com/manga/91)
description.es: Alto, un estudiante de una escuela de magia que estaba a punto de reprobar, invoco a un demonio sellado: Vermeil, como resultado de la activación de un circulo mágico dentro de un libro que encontró por accidente. Vermeil es una hermana mayor muy seductora con un poder tan grande que se puede decir que es una ¡¿calamidad?! ¡El mago camina con el monstruo mágico más fuerte que existe!
description.ja: 留年の危機に瀕していた魔法学校の生徒・アルトは偶然見つけた本の魔法陣を発動させた結果、封印されていた悪魔・ヴェルメイを召喚してしまった！ヴェルメイは厄災ともいえる強大な力を持つ、大変不健全なお姉さんで!? 崖っぷち魔術師が最強の使い魔と歩む王道ファンタジー開幕!!
description.ru: Ученик школы магии Альто, который был на грани того, чтобы остатся на второй учебный год, случайно нашел книгу, которая активировала магический круг, и в результате вызвал запечатанного дьявола Вермеила! Вермеил-очень нездоровая старшая сестра с силой, достаточно разрушительной, чтобы ее можно было назвать катастрофой! Ученик мага идет бок о бок с самым сильным существом на свете!!
description.vi: Một học sinh tại trường phép thuật, Alto, đối mặt với nguy cơ học lại, tình cờ tìm thấy một cuốn sách triệu hổi cũ, và đã triệu hồi ác quỷ bị phong ấn Vermeil!

title.en: Ochikobore Shiro Madoushi Cecil wa Taishougai no Hazu deshita

altTitles.zh-hk: 菜鳥白魔法師塞西爾本非我愛

altTitles.zh: 菜鸟白魔法师塞西尔本非我爱

altTitles.ja: 落ちこぼれ白魔導士セシルは対象外のはずでした

description.en: During a party, Cecil, a clumsy white mage, spills on Oswald, the popular leader of the first squadron of holy knights, a homemade antidote. The reason is that he emitted a strong evil aura. An upset Oswald kidnaps her an takes her to his mansion, and she panics: "My chastity is in danger! Cecil grows impatient, but he rebuffs her, telling her: "You are not to my liking". It seems that Oswald is behind Cecil's potion, which was the first to take effect on a curse he had received in the past. Oswald formally asks Cecil to treat him, and she decides to take the opportunity to make a name for herself and accepts the request....
description.ja: 落ちこぼれの白魔導士セシルはパーティの最中、社交界人気ナンバーワンの第一聖騎士隊隊長オズワルドにお手製の解毒薬をぶっかけてしまう。その理由は、彼から強烈な邪気が放たれていたから。不機嫌なオズワルドに彼の屋敷まで拉致され「貞操の危機!?」と焦るセシルだが、「お前は趣味じゃない」と一蹴される。どうやら彼の目的は、過去に受けた呪いに初めて効果があったというセシルの薬のようで――!?オズワルドから正式に治療の依頼を受けたセシルは、功績を残すチャンス！と引き受けることにするが……。

title.en: The Moon on a Rainy Night

altTitles.fr: The Moon on a Rainy Night (Meian)

altTitles.pt-br: A Lua em uma Noite Chuvosa

altTitles.es-la: La luna en una noche lluviosa

description.en: One rainy night, Saki is rushing to a piano lesson when she crashes into a beautiful, long-haired girl, dropping her sheet music in the process. Saki stutters an apology, but the girl simply hands back her sheet music and leaves without a word. Saki begins her first day of high school the following morning, only to find the stranger from the night before sitting at the desk next to hers. She learns that the girl’s name is Kanon and that she is not quite completely deaf, but very hard of hearing. Though Kanon needs to be close to people to read their lips, she tends to push people away with her icy demeanor. Through one kind gesture, Saki slowly begins breaking down the walls around Kanon, even as she feels something new blossoming within her.
description.ja:
2人の少女の、目には見えないもの、かけがえのないこと。

金田一咲希は高校入学直前のある日、ピアノレッスンに向かう途中で見知らぬ同世代の少女とぶつかり手を擦りむくが、相手から無言のまま真っすぐに見つめられた後、落とした楽譜を丁寧に拾われ絆創膏をもらう。咲希は印象的だったその少女とクラスメイトとして再会し、名前が及川奏音、そして耳が不自由だと知る。学校では障害を理由に周囲と距離を置く奏音に、淋しさを覚えた咲希はどうにか分かり合おうとし、そんな彼女の姿に奏音の態度も次第に変わっていき…。
description.ko: 고등학교에 입학한 사키와 귀가 불편한 반 친구 카논. 사람들과 거리를 두는 카논이 안고 있는 것과 겉으론 보이지 않는 것. 그것을 알고자 하는 사키에게 카논도 점차···. 두 소녀의 눈에는 보이지 않는 것, 둘도 없이 소중한 것.
description.pt-br: Um dia, pouco antes de entrar no colégio, Kazuki Kaneda colide com uma garota estranha da mesma geração a caminho da aula de piano e machuca sua mão, mas a partitura que caiu silenciosamente, da outra parte é cuidadosamente recolhida e um curativo é recebido. Saki se reúne com a garota impressionante como colega de classe e descobre que seu nome é Oikawa Kanon e ela é surda. Na escola, Saki, que estava sozinha, tentou entender o som de Kanon, que manteve distância do ambiente por causa de sua deficiência, e sua atitude mudou gradualmente.

description.en: In order to be bought by a rich family, Narumi Inoue, hiding the truth that he is a man, goes to a girls' school. As a trainee, Narumi was sent to serve a girl from a rich family who hates maids (only weekends). Keeping the 'heart of treating/serving people,' Japanese maid, Maid in Japan, Narumi's battle will start? If it is found out that Narumi is a man, he will be castrated.

Upon being reincarnated into a fantasy world, Ryo wants to live out his days in peace with his newfound water magic. He can only conjure a cupful at a time, but it’s enough to eke out a comfortable existence — or so he thought.

The powers that be cast him into the wild outlands with nothing more than a humble shack, a single knife, some food... and abilities that are yet beyond his comprehension. The area is overrun by monsters and there’s nary another human in sight. Ryo must now figure out how to survive above all else, but he’s ready to take bulls, boars, and a whole host of other monsters by the horns if it means seizing the life he wants for himself.

Each new victory brings a new challenge, but what could a fateful encounter with a headless horseman, a dragon, and a castaway swordsman have in common? They’re the first steps on a grand journey that will take Ryo beyond the borders of all he knows to become the greatest water magician the world has ever seen — one adventure at a time.

A sweet and happy two year marriage felt like a dream. One day, her husband disappeared without a trace. Han Seoryeong, an ordinary housewife and blind woman, desperately searches for him... “You’ll never find him.” Her husband turned out to be the best secret agent with many faces. “Our marriage was everything to me, but it was just ‘work’ to him?” In the midst of her world crumbling, Seoryeong mistakenly unleashes the madness she had been suppressing.…
description.fr:
Deux années de mariage aussi douces qu’un rêve.
Mais un jour, son mari disparaît sans laisser de trace.

Han Seoryeong, femme au foyer ordinaire et non-voyante, part à sa recherche,
mais la vérité qu’elle découvre dépasse l’imaginable.

Son mari était un agent secret aux cent visages,
et tout ce qu’elle croyait vrai n’était qu’une façade pour son “travail”.

Dévastée par le désespoir, Seoryeong laisse exploser la folie qu’elle avait refoulée.
Si elle ne peut pas le traquer, elle choisira de devenir sa proie !

altTitles.ja-ro: Toaru Majutsu no Index Gaiden: Toaru Kagaku no Railgun

altTitles.es: Un cierto cañón de riel científico

altTitles.th: เรลกัน แฟ้มลับคดีวิทยาศาสตร์

altTitles.ja: とある科学の超電磁砲
とある魔術の禁書目録外伝 とある科学の超電磁砲

description.en:
Welcome to a world where mysticism and science collide, and supernatural powers are derived from either science or religion. At the heart of this world is Academy City, an advanced metropolis whose population is comprised mostly of students The majority of students are enrolled in the city's "Power Curriculum Program," where they must learn to master their latent psychic powers. Out of several million students, only seven are deemed powerful enough to have Level 5 status.

Meet Mikoto Misaka, the third most powerful Level 5 ESPer in Academy City. Together with her best friends Kuroko Shirai and the other members of Judgment, a student-run law enforcement agency, Mikoto delves deep into the dark heart of the scientific sprawl she calls home, and uncovers secrets she wishes she hadn't!
description.ru:
Где-то на островах Южной Японии раскинулся Академия Сити - город, большинство жителей которого учатся и работают в школах юных эсперов. Обладатели паранормальных способностей в поте лица трудятся, чтобы познать свой дар и поднять владение им на новую высоту. Гордость школы Токивадай и всего города? Мисака Микото – третья по силе среди известных миру эсперов высшего уровня. У «Электрической принцессы» много полезных умений, одно из которых – ручной рейлган, то есть возможность своими электромагнитными способностями разогнать монетку где-то до трех Махов (на другом конце траектории стоять не рекомендуется). Но всех усилий Микото пока не хватает для решения двух насущных задач: отбиться от юрийных домогательств своей подруги Сирай Куроко и разобраться с наглым парнем по имени Камидзё Тома!

title.en: Henjo ~Hen na Joshi Kousei Amaguri Senko~

altTitles.ja: 変女～変な女子高生 甘栗千子～

altTitles.en: Henjo: The Strange Female High-Schooler Amaguri Senko

description.en: Amaguri Senko is a high school girl with a cool personality (as in kuudere) and a big pervert. She openly reads porn, masturbates and isn't perturbed in the slightest at the sight of penises and such. The story centers around Senko's daily life with two male handymen working for her father's company  which she also helps out with, Takamura Ryou and Sugita Kouhei. Takamura ends up being constantly sexually harassed by Senko, partially due to his phimosis dick that caught her interest,  but little did he know, she wasn't joking when she bluntly said "I like you"…
description.fr: Amaguri Senko est une lycéenne kuudere, mais surtout une gigantesque perverse. Elle lit ouvertement du porno, se masturbe et la vue d'un pénis ne l'affecte pas le moins du monde. Voici l'histoire de sa vie quotidienne en compagnie de deux hommes-à-tout-faire employés de la société de son père : Sugita Kouhei et Takamura Ryou. Ce dernier se retrouve constamment harcelé sexuellement par Senko, mais il est bien loin de se douter qu'elle ne plaisantait pas le jour où elle lui a dit qu'elle l'aimait…
description.ja: 就職難のこの時代、フツーの男子・高村の就職先は今どき珍しい住み込みスタイルの「便利屋 甘栗」！そこの娘の千子ちゃんは女子高生でカワイイんだけど、少し?変な?女子高生だった！突如、始まった彼女との同居生活は事件の連続!?
description.pt-br: Amaguri Senko é uma estudante do ensino médio com uma personalidade legal (como em kuudere) e uma grande pervertida. Ela lê pornografia abertamente, se masturba e não se incomoda nem um pouco ao ver pênis e coisas assim. A história gira em torno da vida diária de Senko com dois trabalhadores manuais que trabalham para a empresa de seu pai, na qual ela também ajuda, Takamura Ryou e Sugita Kouhei. Takamura acaba sendo constantemente assediado sexualmente por Senko, em parte devido ao seu pênis com fimose que despertou seu interesse, mas ele mal sabia que ela não estava brincando quando disse sem rodeios "Eu gosto de você"...

description.en: A series between the expressionless drugstore clerk, Sa-chan, and her boisterous childhood friend who's head over heels over Sa-chan but hesitant in confessing his love for her. Join them in their romcom-packed everyday life working at a drugstore.
description.fr: > Une série réunissant une employée de pharmacie sans expression, Sa-chan, et son ami d'enfance turbulent qui est fou amoureux d'elle mais qui hésite à lui avouer son amour. Accompagnez-les dans leur quotidien plein de comédie amoureuse en travaillant dans une pharmacie.
description.id: Seri antara petugas toko obat tanpa ekspresi, Sa-chan, dan teman masa kecilnya yang riuh yang jungkir balik terhadap Sa-chan tetapi ragu-ragu dalam mengakui cintanya padanya. Bergabunglah dengan mereka dalam kehidupan sehari-hari mereka yang penuh romansa bekerja di toko obat.
description.ja: ドラッグストアで働くさっちゃんとその幼なじみが両思いなんだけど、お互い気づかなくて毎日やきもきする話です。
description.pt-br: Uma série entre a inexpressiva balconista da drogaria, Sa-chan, e seu turbulento amigo de infância que está de ponta-cabeça por Sa-chan, mas hesita em confessar seu amor por ela. Junte-se a eles em sua vida cotidiana repleta de comédia romântica trabalhando em uma farmácia.

description.en:
Midnight is the story of a taxi driver named Shinya Mito (whose name is literally Japanese for "mid" and "night") and his various passengers, each of whom he helps in various ways. Shinya drives a taxi as a way to earn money for the treatment of a young woman named Mari, whose brain was injured sometime earlier as the result of an accident Shinya was responsible for causing. The taxi Shinya drives is equipped with a fifth wheel which makes the car more maneuverable under any kind of road conditions.

---
**Volumes 354-359 of the Osamu Tezuka Complete Works**
description.tr: Shinya Mito (Midnight) taksi şoförüdür. Hayatın sillesini yemiş peş parasız haldedir. Komadaki sevgilisinin bir gün iyileşeceği umuduyla taksicilik yapmaktadır. Gece vardiyasında çalıştığı için şehrin binbir türlü yüzüne şahit olur.

description.en: University student Hirose Kiyotaka finds a love letter tucked into the pages of a borrowed book. While attempting to return the letter, he encounters the charismatic Hanashiro Seiji and quickly becomes involved with him. As their tentative relationship develops, however, he finds himself wondering how serious Hanashiro's feelings for him really are. Meanwhile, the letter falls into the hands of Hanashiro's colleague Sawa Jinichiro, who entraps its writer, Arihara Mineo. Sawa's actions are seemingly ruthless, but his true motives regarding Arihara are far from clear.
Controlling the Queendom of Sebek's female prison with the Power of the Kraken!
description.id: Shimizu Kuuma, seorang laki-laki, yang baru saja kembali dari wawancara kerja yang tidak bisa dia selesaikan, tiba-tiba dikirim ke dunia lain, di sana dia bertemu dengan seorang gadis tertentu yang membantunya dan memberinya pekerjaan di penjara tetapi yang tidak dia ketahui adalah bahwa ini hanya jebakan untuk membawanya dan agar dia bisa 'dinikmati' oleh Bosnya, kemudian setelah dia dibantai dan dibuang ke laut dan hampir mati dia diselamatkan oleh Kraken yang menceritakan kisahnya tentang bagaimana Dia diselamatkan oleh seorang gadis tertentu yang adalah seorang tahanan, jadi mereka membuat kesepakatan, kemudian dia menyelamatkan gadis itu dan melakukan Pembalasan.
description.ja: 就職難に悩む男子学生・クウマは、いきなり異世界に飛ばされてしまう。そこで女監獄・海獄城に連れて行かれたクウマは、海の覇者・魔獣クラーケンと融合し、絶大なイカの異能力を得る。陰謀で死刑囚にされたゼイナ姫の救出を託され、クウマは海獄城に獄卒として潜り込むが、そこには個性豊かな女囚たちが待ち受けていた……。クウマは女囚たちをイカの力で心もカラダも攻略し、ゼイナ姫を助けることが出来るのか!?
description.es-la: Shimizu Kuuma es un chico que siempre devuelve los favores. Un día, al regresar de una entrevista de trabajo fallida, es repentinamente transportado a otro mundo. En este mundo es salvado por una chica, quien le ofrece un trabajo como guardia de una prisión de mujeres. Sin pensarlo dos veces, Kuuma acepta, pero no se imaginó, que sería casi asesinado por una prisionera. Ellas tiran su cuerpo al mar, pero antes de morir, la criatura más fuerte del mar, el Kraken, lo salva y le ofrece fusionarse con él a cambio de algo. Es así como Kuuma sobrevive, consigue los poderes del Kraken y está dispuesto a tomar el control de la prisión para devolverle el favor al Kraken.

altTitles.vi: Mệnh Danh Thuật Của Bóng Tối

description.en: In the blue and purple neon, under the dense steel sky, the front end of the data torrent is the world after the technological revolution, and it is also the boundary between reality and illusion. Steel and body, past and future. Here, the outer world and the inner world coexist, and everything in front of you is like a wall of time. Darkness gradually shrouded. But you have to understand, my friend, that we cannot deal with darkness with tenderness, but with fire.
description.zh: 蓝与紫的霓虹中，浓密的钢铁苍穹下，数据洪流的前端，是科技革命之后的世界，也是现实与虚幻的分界。 钢铁与身体，过去与未来。 这里，表世界与里世界并存，面前的一切，像是时间之墙近在眼前。 黑暗逐渐笼罩。 可你要明白啊我的朋友，我们不能用温柔去应对黑暗，要用火。
